attributes.action: Insist that the fifteen police officers responsible for the death of Jean Charles de Menezes face a full public enquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All fifteen police officers responsible for the death of Jean Charles de Menezes on the 22nd of July 2005 should be required to explain the critical chain of command failures that led to the shooting at a full public inquiry. Further, the Metropolitan Police should be required to justify the incorrect and misleading press statements made about Mr de Menezes in the hours and days following his death.
